scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.copy-vendor: mkdir -p public/vendor/lucide public/vendor/highlight.js public/vendor/axios && cp node_modules/lucide/dist/umd/lucide.js public/vendor/lucide/lucide.js && cp node_modules/highlight.js/lib/common/highlight.js public/vendor/highlight.js/highlight.min.js && cp node_modules/highlight.js/styles/github-dark.min.css public/vendor/highlight.js/ && cp node_modules/axios/dist/axios.min.js public/vendor/axios/axios.min.js
scripts.build:all: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run copy-vendor
